summary: Add a “Learn more about us” button to the About section on the homepage that links to the existing About page.

existing_features.title: Add a new button labeled "Learn more about us" within the homepage About section (component: frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproachSection.tsx) and place it within the About / Firm Overview block so it appears after the overview text content.

Wire the new "Learn more about us" button to navigate to the existing About page route at "/about" using the app's client-side router navigation (import and use navigate from frontend/src/router/router.ts), without a full page reload.
Ensure the new button styling is consistent with existing call-to-action buttons in the app and includes basic accessibility support (keyboard focus visible, descriptive label text).
